Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 130th/Ellis
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Granville
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Granville due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Granville due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
